name: SpeakToCharacter
description: Talk to another character in the simulation world.
usage: Use this action when you want to communicate with another character.

parameters.name: character_name
parameters.description: The name of the character to talk to

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to say to the character

examples: Asking a question: "How are you today?"
Making a request: "Can you help me with this?"
requirements: Target character must be nearby and interactable
Character must be included in the available interactable entities
whenToUse: Want to express thoughts or feelings
